column5: I wanna replace the bushings on my pin VT-1000. The VT-1002 model has the bearings that will fit on mine...Tried Okuma web site and have difficulties ording...Any of you folks know local takcle shops that can help me or know where to get them? Thx
i had to replace the bearings on my Sheffield.jb's fishing depot was able to order them for me  travis
